name: basic half double crochet hat
notes:
this versatile hat pattern includes instructions for two lengths: one reaching the base of the ear and one mid-ear, perfect for adapting to different seasons. living in ontario, i prefer full ear coverage for winter, but a mid-ear length for warmer weather. i thought you'd appreciate the flexibility too!

the pattern is worked in continuous rounds (no slip stitch joins or chains), resulting in a seamless, neat finish. however, you can opt to use slip stitches and chain-1 joins if you prefer, just keep the slip stitches small to minimize the seam.

for cotton yarn like bernat handicrafter cotton, check out my [basic half double crochet hat pattern for medium weight cotton.][1]
